Hi C=EDcero 

Correct.  The .ga file is passed as a parameter to the experi=
ment
server.  You then start up the remote agent(s) as required.  All this
=
is documented on the website (neat4j.org).  You will need access to an
unre=
al tournament app for each remote agent - I don't know how UT
works, I gues=
s its a server based env which you just connect to.

As ever, if you want t=
o discuss more, just shout up.

Cheers

Matt
